allow:
Bash(1 <<'YAML'
specs:
  - name: test
    template: "start,{% render 'part' %},end"
    filesystem:
      part: "before\\n{{ 'input' | truncate: 1.5 }}\\nafter"
YAML)
Bash(bash -c "bundle exec liquid-spec run spec/liquid_il.rb -n recursion_include_error_inline 2>&1 | grep -v ''missing extensions''")
Bash(bash -c "bundle exec liquid-spec run spec/liquid_il_optimized_compiled.rb -n recursion_include_error_inline 2>&1 | grep -v ''missing extensions''")
Bash(bash -c "bundle exec liquid-spec run spec/liquid_il_optimized_compiled.rb 2>&1 | tail -5")
Bash(bash -c "bundle exec liquid-spec run spec/liquid_il.rb 2>&1 | tail -5")

Bash(LIQUID_PASSES="" ruby -Ilib -e '
require """"liquid_il""""

class MemoryFS
  def initialize\(templates\)
    @templates = templates
  end
  def read\(name\)
    @templates[name]
  end
end

fs = MemoryFS.new\(""""part"""" => """"before\\n{{ ''''input'''' | truncate: 1.5 }}\\nafter""""\)
ctx = LiquidIL::Context.new\(file_system: fs\)
opt = LiquidIL::Optimizer.optimize\(ctx\)
il_template = opt.parse\(""""start,{% render ''''part'''' %},end""""\)
compiled = LiquidIL::Compiler::Ruby.compile\(il_template\)

# Show the full compiled source including partials
puts compiled.instance_variable_get\(:@compiled_source\)
')
Bash(do echo "=== LIQUID_PASSES=''''$passes'''' ===" LIQUID_PASSES="$passes" ruby -Ilib test/error_handling_test.rb)
Bash(bash -c "bundle exec liquid-spec run spec/liquid_il.rb 2>&1 | tail -3")
